title: (x) Feriado - Metsys {Stephen}
content:
Can somebody help me? What is it?   
   
 ![feriado](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012005351im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/7359.jpg)
author: fuentes bo

comments.content: Quite impressive, Stephen: you had very little to work with to ID this one. 8-o

BTW [FontWorks](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012005351/http:/www.fontworks1.type.co.uk/cgi-bin/fontworks2/catalog?88ZVLMxM) has a [more complete character set sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012005351/http:/www.fontworks1.type.co.uk/cgi-bin/fontworks2/x001714000?88ZVLMxM;;2346), where you can see the uc G.
Thanks Yvezzie. That 'D' is hard to forget.
